page.title: 10 Games People Play
page.content: Games People Play In the summer the fist years at Worlingham Middle School (the school I go to) play skipping in the schoolyard.Here are some skipping games they play-Bumper car,Hollwood, mississippi.The boys play football.My friends and I play football with the boys although we are the only girls that play.We also play bulldog. In lessons the girls play netball and hockey in the winter,and the boys play rugby and football.In the summer boys and girls do jumps(long and high)and track and field events such as relay sprint running and throwing.Girls throw a rounders ball and boys throw a criket ball.
